name: BlueRobot-Demo
description:
This project started as an experiment to learn how to make 3D games in the Godot engine. The game turned out better than I expected, so I wanted to do more with it, but things happened and I had to abandon the project. I don't know if I will work on it more, but for now I wanted to share what I have.

Controls:

A W S D -> move

Space -> Jump

Shift -> Dash

Left button -> Shoot
